text:
──…戦闘での熱が引かない。 もし緊急の召集があった場合なにかしらの支障が出るのは確実だ。 一度自室へ戻るべきか、このままダンテの部屋へ向かうべきか。 身なりを整えてから向かった方が良いのだろうけれど、ダンテは異常があったらすぐに知らせろと言っていた。
(…管理人様の元へ、行かなくては)
故にムルソーはダンテの個室がある扉へと向かう。 しかしそこには先客がおり、ムルソーに気付くとすぐに顔を顰めた。
trans:
––…The fever from the battle hasn’t subsided. If there’s an emergency call-up, it’s certain to cause some kind of issue. Should I return to my room first, or head straight to Dante’s room? It would probably be better to tidy myself up before going, but Dante did say to report immediately if anything was wrong.
(...I need to go to the Administrator)
And so, Meursault made his way toward the door that opened onto Dante's private room. He got there, though only to find that already somebody was there. He scowled when he saw Meursault.
